title: 88/460/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 July 1988 approving an integrated Mediterranean programme for the Basilicata region (only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 July 1988
approving an integrated Mediterranean programme for the Basilicata region
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(88/460/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Basilicata IMP in the version submitted to the Commission on 18 December 1986, as subsequently modified after examination by the Commission and following consultation of the Advisory Committee for Integrated Mediterranean Programmes, is hereby approved. The estimates of tatal expenditure and the estimated contributions from each Community budgetary source are schown in the financial plan of the Basilicata IMP.
In so far as the measures are carried out in accordance with the Basilicata IMP, within the limits of the overall expenditure estimates and in compliance with the rules and procedures relating to each source of Community contributions specified in the Basilicata IMP.

The contribution from the special budget heading referred to in Article 11 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No
2088/85 shall not exceed 12 036 890 ECU in respect of the expenditure to be incurred in the period from 1 January 1988 to 31 December 1992 on measures to be financed in the context of the Basilicata IMP, estimated at 156 877 000 ECU.

Pursuant to Article 15 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2088/85, a first instalment from the special budget heading referred to in Article 11 (2) of that Regulation amounting to 2 045 350 ECU is hereby committed in accordance with the financial plan of the Basilicata IMP.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1988.
For the Commission
Grigoris VARFIS
Member of the Commission
